chapters.title: Chapter 16:  Tellings of the Wheel
chapters.info: Modrellein, p. 277—Misspelling of Mordrellen, Queen of Andor before Morgase. Editor's note: there is a Queen of Andor named Modrellein, but she ruled Andor many years prior to Mordrellen. This mistake has been corrected in the paperback edition, but is very common in the series. See Mantear, Mordrellen.
